options.content:
This dashboard provides the information required to analyse the health of the Cortex Innovation platform.

|Filter  |Description|
|--------|-----------|
| Tenant | List of tenants. |
| System | List of systems. |
| Node | List of hosts that processed the requests. |
| API | List of the API endpoints found in the HTTP requests. |
| Status Code | List of [status codes](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Hypertext_Transfer_Protocol#Status_codes) found in the HTTP responses. |
| Result | List of results found in the HTTP responses. |
| Initiator IP Address | List of IP addresses for the initiators of the requests. |
| Interval | List of intervals to perform the time series aggregations upon. This only affects the graphs on this dashboard. |
| Custom Filter | Enables filtering on all available values including those that are not exposed by default. |

All filters (excluding Interval and Custom Filter) will display their available options dependant on the preceeding filters selected.

# Overview  
Key platform health metrics for the specified time range.  
  
**Note:** The Interval filter does not affect these values.

panels.description:
Displays the availability of the platform by calculating the successful requests / total requests during the specified time range.  Successful requests are all requests that do not result in a 5xx HTTP response, 4xx responses are considered successful in this scenario.

| Threshold | Value | Colour |
|------------------|-----------|------------|
| OK  | > 95% | green |
| WARNING |  > 90% | orange |
| CRITICAL |   < 90% | red |

targets.expr: sum(count_over_time({job="flows", Tenant=~"$Tenant", System=~"$System", Node=~"$Node", Type=~"$API", StatusCode=~"$StatusCode", ErrorType=~"$Result", InitiatorIpAddress=~"$Initiator"} |~ "\"SourceContext\":.?\"Cortex[.]ServiceFabric[.]Service[.]ApiGateway\"" [$__range]))

(sum(count_over_time({job="flows", Tenant=~"$Tenant", System=~"$System", Node=~"$Node", Type=~"$API", StatusCode=~"$StatusCode", ErrorType=~"$Result", InitiatorIpAddress=~"$Initiator"} |~ "\"StatusCode\":.?[1-4,6-9][0-9][0-9]" |~ "\"SourceContext\":.?\"Cortex[.]ServiceFabric[.]Service[.]ApiGateway\"" [$__range])) or (sum(count_over_time({job="flows"}[$__range])) * 0))

sum(count_over_time({job="flows", Tenant=~"$Tenant", System=~"$System", Node=~"$Node", Type=~"$API", StatusCode=~"$StatusCode", ErrorType=~"$Result", InitiatorIpAddress=~"$Initiator"} |~ "\"SourceContext\":.?\"Cortex[.]ServiceFabric[.]Service[.]ApiGateway\"" [1s]))

panels.title: Availability

panels.description: Displays the total number of requests during the specified time range.
panels.title: Total Requests

panels.description: Displays the total number of errored requests during the specified time range.  Errored requests are all requests that result in an unknown or 5xx HTTP response, 4xx responses are considered successful in this scenario.
panels.title: Errored Requests

panels.description:
Displays the mean duration for requests during the specified time range.

Note: Certain APIs may take significantly longer than others skewing the result.

targets.expr: avg_over_time({job="flows", Tenant=~"$Tenant", System=~"$System", Node=~"$Node", Type=~"$API", StatusCode=~"$StatusCode", ErrorType=~"$Result", InitiatorIpAddress=~"$Initiator"} |~ "\"InMs\":.?" |~ "\"SourceContext\":.?\"Cortex[.]ServiceFabric[.]Service[.]ApiGateway\"" | json | unwrap Event_Duration_InMs [$__range]) by (job)

panels.title: Mean Request Duration

options.content:
# Availability
The availability of the Cortex Innovation platform.

panels.description:
Displays the availability of the Cortex Innovation Platform by calculating successful requests / total requests. Successful requests are all requests that do not result in a 5xx HTTP response, 4xx responses are considered successful in this scenario.

Each data point value is calculated by aggregating requests based on the Interval filter.  Currently each data point value will be an aggregation of the data for the previous $Interval.  If we have no data for the previous $Interval, the line will be broken as we do not know the availability at this time.

| Threshold | Value | Colour |
|------------------|-----------|------------|
| OK  | > 95% | green |
| WARNING |  > 90% | orange |
| CRITICAL |   < 90% | red |

targets.expr: (sum(count_over_time({job="flows", Tenant=~"$Tenant", System=~"$System", Node=~"$Node", Type=~"$API", StatusCode=~"$StatusCode", ErrorType=~"$Result", InitiatorIpAddress=~"$Initiator"} |~ "\"StatusCode\":.?[1-4,6-9][0-9][0-9]" |~ "\"SourceContext\":.?\"Cortex[.]ServiceFabric[.]Service[.]ApiGateway\"" [$Interval])) or (sum(count_over_time({job="flows"}[$Interval])) * 0))

(sum(count_over_time({job="flows", Tenant=~"$Tenant", System=~"$System", Node=~"$Node", Type=~"$API", StatusCode=~"$StatusCode", ErrorType=~"$Result", InitiatorIpAddress=~"$Initiator"} |~ "\"SourceContext\":.?\"Cortex[.]ServiceFabric[.]Service[.]ApiGateway\"" [$Interval])))

(sum(count_over_time({job="flows", Tenant=~"$Tenant", System=~"$System", Node=~"$Node", Type=~"$API", StatusCode=~"$StatusCode", ErrorType=~"$Result", InitiatorIpAddress=~"$Initiator"} |~ "\"SourceContext\":.?\"Cortex[.]ServiceFabric[.]Service[.]ApiGateway\"" [1s])))

(sum(count_over_time({job="flows", Tenant=~"$Tenant", System=~"$System", Node=~"$Node", Type=~"$API", StatusCode=~"$StatusCode", ErrorType=~"$Result", InitiatorIpAddress=~"$Initiator"} !~ "\"StatusCode\":.?[1-4,6-9][0-9][0-9]" |~ "\"SourceContext\":.?\"Cortex[.]ServiceFabric[.]Service[.]ApiGateway\"" [$Interval])) )

panels.title: Availability

options.content:
# Requests
Requests processed by the Cortex Innovation platform during the specified time range.

panels.description:
Displays the count of all requests.

Each data point value is calculated by aggregating requests based on the Interval filter.  Currently each data point value will be an aggregation of the data for the previous $Interval.

Also displays count of all requests per second.
panels.title: Requests

panels.description:
Displays the Top 10 HTTP responses that occured during the specified time range with their mean, minimum and maximum duration in seconds. 

Note: The Interval filter does not affect this list.

targets.expr: topk(10, sum by (StatusCode, ErrorType) (count_over_time({job="flows", Tenant=~"$Tenant", System=~"$System", Node=~"$Node", Type=~"$API", StatusCode=~"$StatusCode", ErrorType=~"$Result", InitiatorIpAddress=~"$Initiator"} |~ "\"SourceContext\":.?\"Cortex[.]ServiceFabric[.]Service[.]ApiGateway\"" | json [$__range])))

avg by (StatusCode, ErrorType) (avg_over_time({job="flows", Tenant=~"$Tenant", System=~"$System", Node=~"$Node", Type=~"$API", StatusCode=~"$StatusCode", ErrorType=~"$Result", InitiatorIpAddress=~"$Initiator"} |~ "\"InMs\":.?"  |~ "\"SourceContext\":.?\"Cortex[.]ServiceFabric[.]Service[.]ApiGateway\"" | json | unwrap Event_Duration_InMs [$__range]))

min by (StatusCode, ErrorType) (min_over_time({job="flows", Tenant=~"$Tenant", System=~"$System", Node=~"$Node", Type=~"$API", StatusCode=~"$StatusCode", ErrorType=~"$Result", InitiatorIpAddress=~"$Initiator"} |~ "\"InMs\":.?"  |~ "\"SourceContext\":.?\"Cortex[.]ServiceFabric[.]Service[.]ApiGateway\"" | json | unwrap Event_Duration_InMs [$__range]))

max by (StatusCode, ErrorType) (max_over_time({job="flows", Tenant=~"$Tenant", System=~"$System", Node=~"$Node", Type=~"$API", StatusCode=~"$StatusCode", ErrorType=~"$Result", InitiatorIpAddress=~"$Initiator"} |~ "\"InMs\":.?"  |~ "\"SourceContext\":.?\"Cortex[.]ServiceFabric[.]Service[.]ApiGateway\"" | json | unwrap Event_Duration_InMs [$__range]))

topk(10, sum by (StatusCode, ErrorType) (count_over_time({job="flows", Tenant=~"$Tenant", System=~"$System", Node=~"$Node", Type=~"$API", StatusCode=~"$StatusCode", ErrorType=~"$Result", InitiatorIpAddress=~"$Initiator"} !~ "\"StatusCode\":.?[1-4,6-9][0-9][0-9]" |~ "\"SourceContext\":.?\"Cortex[.]ServiceFabric[.]Service[.]ApiGateway\"" | json [$__range])))

topk(10, avg by (StatusCode, ErrorType) (avg_over_time({job="flows", Tenant=~"$Tenant", System=~"$System", Node=~"$Node", Type=~"$API", StatusCode=~"$StatusCode", ErrorType=~"$Result", InitiatorIpAddress=~"$Initiator"} |~ "\"InMs\":.?" |~ "\"SourceContext\":.?\"Cortex[.]ServiceFabric[.]Service[.]ApiGateway\"" | json | unwrap Event_Duration_InMs [$__range])))

sum by (StatusCode, ErrorType) (count_over_time({job="flows", Tenant=~"$Tenant", System=~"$System", Node=~"$Node", Type=~"$API", StatusCode=~"$StatusCode", ErrorType=~"$Result", InitiatorIpAddress=~"$Initiator"} |~ "\"SourceContext\":.?\"Cortex[.]ServiceFabric[.]Service[.]ApiGateway\"" | json [$__range]))

panels.title: Top 10 Responses by Total Count

options.content:
# Errors
Errored request history for the specified time range.

panels.description:
Displays the:
- count of errored requests
- count of all requests

Each data point value is calculated by aggregating requests based on the Interval filter.  Currently each data point value will be an aggregation of the data for the previous $Interval.

Errored requests are all requests that result in an unknown or 5xx HTTP response, 4xx responses are considered successful in this scenario.
panels.title: Errored Requests

panels.description:
Displays the Top 10 HTTP error responses that occured during the specified time range with their mean, minimum and maximum duration in seconds. Errored requests are all requests that result in an unknown or 5xx HTTP response, 4xx responses are considered successful in this scenario.

Note: The Interval filter does not affect this list.
panels.title: Top 10 Error Responses by Error Count

options.content:
# Duration
Request duration history for the specified time range.

Note: Certain APIs may take significantly longer than others skewing the results.

panels.description:
Displays the:

- mean duration in seconds for all requests
- minimum duration in seconds for all requests
- maximum duration in seconds for all requests

Each data point value is calculated by aggregating requests based on the Interval filter. Currently each data point value will be an aggregation of the data for the previous 5m.

Note: Certain APIs may take significantly longer than others skewing the result.

targets.expr: (avg by (job) (avg_over_time({job="flows", Tenant=~"$Tenant", System=~"$System", Node=~"$Node", Type=~"$API", StatusCode=~"$StatusCode", ErrorType=~"$Result", InitiatorIpAddress=~"$Initiator"} |~ "\"SourceContext\":.?\"Cortex[.]ServiceFabric[.]Service[.]ApiGateway\"" | json | unwrap Event_Duration_InMs [$Interval])) )

(min by (job) (min_over_time({job="flows", Tenant=~"$Tenant", System=~"$System", Node=~"$Node", Type=~"$API", StatusCode=~"$StatusCode", ErrorType=~"$Result", InitiatorIpAddress=~"$Initiator"} |~ "\"SourceContext\":.?\"Cortex[.]ServiceFabric[.]Service[.]ApiGateway\"" | json | unwrap Event_Duration_InMs [$Interval])) )

(max by (job) (max_over_time({job="flows", Tenant=~"$Tenant", System=~"$System", Node=~"$Node", Type=~"$API", StatusCode=~"$StatusCode", ErrorType=~"$Result", InitiatorIpAddress=~"$Initiator"} |~ "\"SourceContext\":.?\"Cortex[.]ServiceFabric[.]Service[.]ApiGateway\"" | json | unwrap Event_Duration_InMs [$Interval])) )

panels.title: Request Duration

panels.description:
Displays the top 10 HTTP responses that occured during the specified time range with their mean, minimum and maximum duration in seconds. 

Note: The Interval filter does not affect this list. Also, certain APIs may take significantly longer than others skewing the result.
panels.title: Top 10 Responses by Mean Duration

list.definition: label_values({job="flows", Tenant=~"$Tenant", System=~"$System", Node=~"$Node", Type=~"$API"}, StatusCode)
list.label: Status Code
list.name: StatusCode
list.query: label_values({job="flows", Tenant=~"$Tenant", System=~"$System", Node=~"$Node", Type=~"$API"}, StatusCode)

list.definition: label_values({job="flows", Tenant=~"$Tenant", System=~"$System", Node=~"$Node", Type=~"$API", StatusCode=~"$StatusCode"}, ErrorType)
list.name: Result
list.query: label_values({job="flows", Tenant=~"$Tenant", System=~"$System", Node=~"$Node", Type=~"$API", StatusCode=~"$StatusCode"}, ErrorType)

list.definition: label_values({job="flows", Tenant=~"$Tenant", System=~"$System", Node=~"$Node", Type=~"$API", StatusCode=~"$StatusCode", ErrorType=~"$Result"}, InitiatorIpAddress)
list.label: Initiator IP Address
list.name: Initiator
list.query: label_values({job="flows", Tenant=~"$Tenant", System=~"$System", Node=~"$Node", Type=~"$API", StatusCode=~"$StatusCode", ErrorType=~"$Result"}, InitiatorIpAddress)
